mapper.select: SELECT user_id, c.community_no, c.community_title, c.community_content, m.posters FROM community c JOIN movie_list2 m ON c.docid = m.docid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO community(user_id, docid, community_title, community_content) VALUES( #{user_id}, #{docid}, #{community_title}, #{community_content} )
mapper.update: UPDATE community SET community_title =#{community_title} ,community_content = #{community_content} WHERE community_no = #{community_no}
